body.p: Suppose that upon liquidation of TC, the preference shares entitle their holders to receive a proportionate share of the assets available for distribution. The holders of the preference shares have equal right and ranking to the holders of ordinary shares in the event of liquidation. Assume that the acquisition‑date fair value of the preference shares is now CU160 and that the proportionate share of TC’s recognised amounts of the identifiable net assets that is attributable to the preference shares is CU140.
